price: 63.Tokkel Nabiyow usun Yalla inkittoysaanaah koo Nummaysaanam cineeniih derre edde cabeenik, toysa diggah Yalli uma maray Baaxo Baysa yaaxigeeh wohul ken galțele Akeeral.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna
